name: Check if Amazon SageMaker Training jobs have network isolation enabled
description: Check if Amazon SageMaker Training jobs have network isolation enabled

name: SageMaker endpoint production variants should have at least two initial instances
description: This control checks whether production variants of an Amazon SageMaker endpoint have an initial instance count greater than 1. A single instance creates a single point of failure and reduces availability.

name: Check if Amazon SageMaker Models have VPC settings configured
description: Check if Amazon SageMaker Models have VPC settings configured

name: Check if Amazon SageMaker Training jobs have volume and output with KMS encryption enabled
description: Check if Amazon SageMaker Training jobs have volume and output with KMS encryption enabled

name: Check if Amazon SageMaker Training job have VPC settings configured.
description: Check if Amazon SageMaker Training job have VPC settings configured.

name: Check if Amazon SageMaker Notebook instances have root access disabled
description: Check if Amazon SageMaker Notebook instances have root access disabled

name: Check if Amazon SageMaker Training jobs have intercontainer encryption enabled
description: Check if Amazon SageMaker Training jobs have intercontainer encryption enabled

name: Check if Amazon SageMaker Models have network isolation enabled
description: Check if Amazon SageMaker Models have network isolation enabled

name: Check if Amazon SageMaker Notebook instances have direct internet access
description: Check if Amazon SageMaker Notebook instances have direct internet access

name: Check if Amazon SageMaker Notebook instances have data encryption enabled
description: Check if Amazon SageMaker Notebook instances have data encryption enabled

name: Check if Amazon SageMaker Notebook instances have VPC settings configured
description: Check if Amazon SageMaker Notebook instances have VPC settings configured
